title: (x) "NY" in NY Yankees logo - hand lettered {Reed Reibstein}
content:
Hi, I'm working on designing tattoo for my friend and he wants me to try something with the font pictured below, the N and Y characters that is.  
Any help with an ID would be appreciated. Thanks!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20120203213509im_/http:/typophile.com/files/yankees_6213.jpg)
author: Hippocrates

comments.content: If you mean that you're looking for the font that makes the N and Y in the logo above, then I'm pretty sure that you're going to be disappointed; it's almost certainly custom hand-lettering. That said, there might be a font reminiscent of the N and Y for you to use, although none come immediately to mind right now.

it's so ubiquitous and simple, why not just find a sample and trace it ?

franchise logo tattoos, hmm....  
are the yankees going to pay your friend to walk around flashing their logo ?

We weren't going to use "NY" but rather other letters in the design. Thats why I was looking for a font.

He ended up choosing another font. I think it was a good decision since this one looks a little goofy in my opinion.
That is a particularly clumsy iteration of it to boot.
